This module implements fields with AVX2.

Imports

binary, disappearresult, ../binary, ../../../../core/cell, ../../../../core/fieldtype, ../../../../core/pair, ../../../../core/position

Types

TsuField = object
Puyo Puyo field with Tsu rule. 
WaterField = object
Puyo Puyo field with Water rule.

Procs

func `[]`(self: TsuField or WaterField; row: Row; col: Column): Cell {.inline.}
func `[]=`(self: var (TsuField or WaterField); row: Row; col: Column; cell: Cell) {.
    inline.}
func colorCount(self: TsuField or WaterField): int {.inline.}
Returns the number of color puyos in the field. 
func connect2[F: TsuField or WaterField](self: F): F {.inline.}
Returns the field with only the locations where exactly two color puyos are connected. This function ignores ghost puyos. 
func connect2H[F: TsuField or WaterField](self: F): F {.inline.}
Returns the field with only the locations where exactly two color puyos are connected horizontally. This function ignores ghost puyos. 
func connect2V[F: TsuField or WaterField](self: F): F {.inline.}
Returns the field with only the locations where exactly two color puyos are connected vertically. This function ignores ghost puyos. 
func connect3[F: TsuField or WaterField](self: F): F {.inline.}
Returns the field with only the locations where exactly three color puyos are connected. This function ignores ghost puyos. 
func connect3H[F: TsuField or WaterField](self: F): F {.inline.}
Returns the field with only the locations where exactly three color puyos are connected horizontally. This function ignores ghost puyos. 
func connect3L[F: TsuField or WaterField](self: F): F {.inline.}
Returns the field with only the locations where exactly three color puyos are connected by L-shape. This function ignores ghost puyos. 
func connect3V[F: TsuField or WaterField](self: F): F {.inline.}
Returns the field with only the locations where exactly three color puyos are connected vertically. This function ignores ghost puyos. 
func disappear(self: var (TsuField or WaterField)): DisappearResult {.inline,
    discardable.}
Removes puyos that should disappear. 
func drop(self: var TsuField) {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Drops floating puyos. 
func drop(self: var WaterField) {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Drops floating puyos. 
func exist(self: TsuField or WaterField): BinaryField {.inline.}
Returns the binary field where any puyo exists. 
func flippedH[F: TsuField or WaterField](self: F): F {.inline.}
Returns the field flipped horizontally. 
func flippedV[F: TsuField or WaterField](self: F): F {.inline.}
Returns the field flipped vertically. 
func garbageCount(self: TsuField or WaterField): int {.inline.}
Returns the number of garbage puyos in the field. 
func initField[F: TsuField or WaterField](): F {.inline.}
Returns the field with all cells None. 
func insert(self: var TsuField; row: Row; col: Column; cell: Cell) {.inline,
    ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Inserts which and shifts the field upward above the location where which is inserted. 
func insert(self: var WaterField; row: Row; col: Column; cell: Cell) {.inline,
    ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Inserts which and shifts the field and shifts the field. If (row, col) is in the air, shifts the field upward above the location where inserted. If it is in the water, shifts the fields downward below the location where inserted. 
func parseField[F: TsuField or WaterField](arr: array[Row, array[Column, Cell]]): F {.
    inline.}
Returns the field converted from the array. 
func put(self: var TsuField; pair: Pair; pos: Position) {.inline, ...raises: [],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Puts the pair. 
func put(self: var WaterField; pair: Pair; pos: Position) {.inline, ...raises: [],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Puts the pair. 
func puyoCount(self: TsuField or WaterField): int {.inline.}
Returns the number of puyos in the field. 
func puyoCount(self: TsuField or WaterField; puyo: Puyo): int {.inline.}
Returns the number of puyo in the field. 
func removeSqueeze(self: var TsuField; row: Row; col: Column) {.inline,
    ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Removes the value at (row, col) and shifts the field downward above the location where the cell is removed. 
func removeSqueeze(self: var WaterField; row: Row; col: Column) {.inline,
    ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Removes the value at (row, col) and shifts the field. If (row, col) is in the air, shifts the field downward above the location where removed. If it is in the water, shifts the fields upward below the location where removed. 
func shiftedDown[F: TsuField or WaterField](self: F): F {.inline.}
Returns the field shifted downward. 
func shiftedLeft[F: TsuField or WaterField](self: F): F {.inline.}
Returns the field shifted leftward. 
func shiftedRight[F: TsuField or WaterField](self: F): F {.inline.}
Returns the field shifted rightward. 
func shiftedUp[F: TsuField or WaterField](self: F): F {.inline.}
Returns the field shifted upward. 
func toArray(self: TsuField or WaterField): array[Row, array[Column, Cell]] {.
    inline.}
Returns the array converted from the field. 
func toTsuField(self: WaterField): TsuField {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
Returns the Tsu field converted from the Water field. 
func toWaterField(self: TsuField): WaterField {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
Returns the Water field converted from the Tsu field. 
func willDisappear(self: TsuField or WaterField): bool {.inline.}
Returns true if any puyos will disappear.
